# W5s Typescript configuration _(@w5s/ts-config)_
<!-- AUTO-GENERATED-CONTENT:END -->

[![NPM Version][package-version-svg]][package-url]
[![License][license-image]][license-url]

<!-- AUTO-GENERATED-CONTENT:START (PKGJSON:template=> ${description}&unknownTxt= ) -->
> Typescript compiler configuration presets
<!-- AUTO-GENERATED-CONTENT:END -->

## Installation

<!-- AUTO-GENERATED-CONTENT:START (PKGJSON:template=```console\nnpm install --save-dev ${name}\n```) -->
```console
npm install --save-dev @w5s/ts-config
```
<!-- AUTO-GENERATED-CONTENT:END -->

## Usage

In the `tsconfig.json` for your project

```json
{
    "extends": "@w5s/ts-config"
}
```

## Requirements
<!-- AUTO-GENERATED-CONTENT:START (PKGJSON:template=Typescript: ${peerDependencies.typescript}&unknownTxt= ) -->
Typescript: >=4.7.x
<!-- AUTO-GENERATED-CONTENT:END -->
